title: Overlay issues for Final Fantasy XIV
body:
Running Final Fantasy XIV in Fullscreen, mumble overlay is displayed, but game will crash after couple of minutes.

Running Final Fantasy XIV in Borderless Windowed, mumble overlay is not displayed, game will not crash.

Overlay debug logs attached for both display mode.

Is there any way to get Final Fantasy XIV to display overlay in Borderless Windowed?

OS: Windows 7 64bit


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1056/ .*

*The following attachments were added on the original item:
* https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1056/attachment/borderless%20windowed.LOG
* https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1056/attachment/fullscreen.LOG*
